website_summaries.verdict: For welders who prefer more side vision as they work, this helmet is definitely one to consider. Additional plasma mode is also good for hobbyists. Filter is on the smaller side, but many users praise the tighter fit.
pros: Side glass panels improve the user's range of vision
cons: Other models in this series have larger filter sizes

customer_reviews.title: Best there is.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dad for his birthday. He LOVES it.
